summary: This document is an inmate housing history record for Jeffrey Edward Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It details his cell assignments and movements within the facility from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019, the day he was found dead.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing history record, detailing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is assigned to House R, Range 01, Bed 001E at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

events.title: Epstein's Final Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's final recorded cell assignment is House 2, Range 04, Bed 206E at the MCC. The record shows a stop time of 07:47, after which he was found dead in his cell.

keyFacts: The document is a detailed log of Jeffrey Epstein's cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) from July 6 to August 10, 2019.
Epstein was moved frequently between different housing units and cells (e.g., House R, House E, House 2, House H) during his incarceration.

His final recorded assignment was to cell 206E in House 2, Range 04, with a stop date/time of August 10, 2019, at 07:47, which corresponds to the day and approximate time he was found deceased in his cell.
